ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ACE Magnetic Field (MAG) Geocentric Solar Ecliptic, GSE, Coordinates, Preliminary Values, Key Parameter (K1), 16 s Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by JMW on 20220808, updated two InformationURL URLs, updated the RepositoryID, updated the SPDF MetadataContact Person to Robert M. Candey, metadata updated to SPASE 2.4.1, reviewed by LFB 20220819

ResourceHeader.Description: This Data Product contains Measurements from the ACE Magnetic Field Instrument (MAG). The Quality of ACE Level 2 Data is such that it is suitable for serious Scientific Study. However, to avoid Confusion and Misunderstanding, it is recommended that Users consult with the appropriate ACE Team Members before publishing Work derived from the Data. The ACE Team has worked hard to ensure that the Level 2 Data are free from Errors, but the Team cannot accept Responsibility for erroneous Data, or for Misunderstandings about how the Data may be used. This is especially true if the appropriate ACE Team Members are not consulted before Publication. At the very least, Preprints should be forwarded to the ACE Team before Publication. MAG References: http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/. ACE Browse Data is designed for monitoring large-scale Particle and Field Behavior and for selecting interesting Time Periods. The Data are automatically generated from the Spacecraft Data Stream using simple Algorithms provided by the Instrument Teams. The Data are not routinely checked for Accuracy and is subject to Revision. Use this Data at your own Risk, and consult with the appropriate Instrument Teams about citing it. The Magnetometer Browse Data is not validated by the Experimenters and should not be used except for preliminary Examination prior to detailed Studies.

TimeSpan.Note: The Data become available about one Week after Observation

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Time PB5
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Time PB5, Time of Observation, Year, Day, and Milliseconds of Day
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Weight, Number of Measurements in Average
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Weight, Number of Measurements in Average for 16 s Data

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field, RMS
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field, Root Mean Square, RMS
Parameter.Caveats: Average Type: RMS. The Magnetic Field Browse Data are not validated by the Experimenters and should not be used except for preliminary Examination prior to detailed Studies.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Magnitude
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Caveats: The Magnetic Field Browse Data are not validated by the Experimenters and should not be used except for preliminary Examination prior to detailed Studies

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Vector, GSE, Cartesian Coordinates
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Vector, Geocentric Solar Ecliptic, GSE, Cartesian Coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: The Magnetic Field Browse Data are not validated by the Experimenters and should not be used except for preliminary Examination prior to detailed Studies
